name: wonder-skin

effect.sun_moon: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Non-damaging moves have exactly 50% base accuracy against this Pokémon.

short_effect: Lowers incoming non-damaging moves' base accuracy to exactly 50%.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Makes status moves more likely to miss.
